infos.value: In Trial Battles, you can hone your skills by fighting as often as you want. I hope you make good use of them.
In Guild Raids, the key is to defeat foes as efficiently as possible.
I recommend divvying up bosses between guild members, according to who is best prepared to defeat them.
Guild Raids are a test of teamwork. The better you cooperate, the more successful you shall be.
• Guild Raids •

• Guild Raids •
A game mode in which Guild Members work together to defeat Bosses with differing strengths and weaknesses.
• Challenge System •

• Challenge System •
There are Trial Battles that do not use up Attempts and Challenges that can be fought once per day.
• Attempts •

• Attempts •
Taking on a Challenge and fighting the battle consumes one Attempt.
• Attempts II •
Once a unit has fought in a Challenge, <color=#00ffff>that unit cannot be used again until Attempts are reset</color>.
• Ongoing Attempts •

• Ongoing Attempts •
If you defeat a Boss, you can fight another without consuming an additional Attempt. In this case, you have to keep the same Formation.
• Resetting •

• Resetting •
The Attempts counter is reset each day at 00:00, World Time (PST). This enables all units to again participate in Challenges.
• Round •

• Round •
Defeating all of the Bosses increases the Round, which allows you to take on more powerful Bosses. Rewards change depending on the Round.
• Damage Ranking •

• Damage Ranking •
You can confirm how much damage Guild Members have inflicted on Bosses, battle records, Formations, etc.
• Guild Ranking •

• Guild Ranking •
You can confirm the overall Guild Score, Individual Scores of Guild Members, current rankings, and Ranking Rewards.
• Score •

• Score •
The score is based on the total HP losses of Bosses plus bonuses.
• Unit/Vision Card Bonus •

• Unit/Vision Card Bonus •
You receive bonus points according to the units and vision cards you have in your Formation.
• Logs/Reports •

• Logs/Reports •
Guild Members can view or copy Formations and battle information from Challenge battles.
• Claim Rewards •

• Claim Rewards •
You can claim rewards for inflicting damage, defeating bosses, and other achievements.
• Event Details •

• Event Details •
Check for updates about events and various kinds of gameplay hints and tips.
